entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm south of Green Bay. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
